issue.title: [C++][OSX] Unused variable warning in python/common.h in release mode
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5840](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5840). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
```Java

/var/folders/cz/jrwncy5s5cb612sgwscd0z8h0000gn/T/arrow-0.14.0.XXXXX.HSei2zjI/apache-arrow-0.14.0/cpp/src/arrow/python/common.h:66:9: warning: unused variable 'r' [-Wunused-variable]
    int r = internal::check_status(result.status());
```
